Source: methods/hexToInt.js

/**
 * convert hex to integer -- rushed and possibly specific to a couple of recent projects so not properly documented
 * @param {string} input1 
 * @returns {number}
 */

var hexToInt = function(input1) {
    //string with two digit hex
    let value = [0, 0];
    for (let i =0;i<2;i++) {
        // console.log(i)
        // console.log(input1.charCodeAt(i))
        value[i] = input1.charCodeAt(i);
        // console.log(value[i])
        value[i] -= value[i] >= 65 ? 55: 48;
    }
    value[0] *= 16;
    let newValue = value[0] + value[1];
    return newValue;
}
// input / 16 and input % 16

// module.exports = hexToInt;

export { hexToInt }
